external_games.name: Present Memories: A Vox Akuma Fangame

name: Present Memories: A Vox Akuma Fangame
storyline: We return to the world of Sengoku, Japan in this unique game filled with stunning visuals inspired by ukiyo-e art, well thought-out gameplay reminiscent of the famous Ace Attorney series, and a simple but captivating story with mystery, twists and many surprises.
summary:
Present Memories is a very special project dedicated to the Nijisanji EN's voice demon, Vox Akuma.

In this visual novel adventure game, you play as Vox himself as he explores his memories and leave no stone unturned for an unforgettable experience with his clan of the past.
